channel.title: Golang on Jim Shaw
channel.description: Recent content in Golang on Jim Shaw

item.title: Go Programming Language
item.description: Go was created by a team inside Google back in 2009. Three big languages that were used at Google at that time were C/C++, Java and Python. The creators of Go saw that each of those three languages was powerful but had limitations. For example, Python was easy to pickup and learn but ran into trouble when running apps at the scale a massive company like Google needed. Java started out simple but its type system grew increasingly complex.
